<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Amoeba Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=750)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An amoeba swarm consists of thousands of individual single-celled organisms held together by acrid-smelling slime. As ravenous as they are mindless, amoeba swarms use no tactics.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Amoeba Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=750)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=122" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +3; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +1

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** -2

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Motion Sense** An amoeba swarm can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 9 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +1 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 35

**Immunities**
acid, critical hits, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)

**Resistances**
slashing 4, piercing 4

**Weaknesses**
area 3, fire 3, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, climb 5 feet, swim 10 feet

**Swarming Slither** <actions string="Single Action" />  The amoeba swarm slithers over each creature in its space, dealing 1d6 acid damage (DC 14 basic Reflex save). A creature that critically fails is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).

**Weak Acid**   An amoeba's acid damages only organic material—not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-79" />
